MobileSiteContent.Value:
Please select a payment method below. Please note that payment cannot be split between different payment methods except for voucher and a credit/debit card.

We charge a Booking and Service Fee for some bookings completed online. Jetstar waives this Booking and Service Fee for all bookings paid for using Jetstar MasterCard, Jetstar Platinum MasterCard, Jetstar Vouchers and some other forms of payment (as indicated below).
To update payment information, please visit jetstar.com

You can cancel your FlexiBiz or Starter Max bundle flight for free, up until airport check-in opens for your flight.

Passengers will be issued a credit voucher for the full amount of their fare within 24 hours. Itâ€™s The credit voucher is single use only and is valid for bookings made within six months of your flight cancellation date.

Your voucher will be sent to: {0}. See the credit voucher full terms and conditions for details.

Fares are one-way, in Singapore dollars (SGD) and are based on bookings made at jetstar.com using SingPost. For all other payment options, a Booking and Service fee applies. Airfare-related surcharges and taxes are included.
See below for current special offers. Please make sure you read the important information about sale and special offer fares.
